name: GeoSPARQL Topology: Egenhofer Properties
abstract: Properties which can be used to describe the topology of geometries using RCC8 relations

examples.title: Equals relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to itself using the geo:ehEquals relation.

examples.title: Disjoint relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to another feature using the geo:ehDisjoint relation.

examples.title: Covers/CoveredBy relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to another feature using the geo:ehCovers relation. The inverse relation geo:ehCoveredBy is placed on the other feature.

examples.title: Contains relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to another feature using the geo:ehContains relation.

examples.title: Inside relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to another feature using the geo:ehInside relation.

examples.title: Meet relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to another feature using the geo:ehMeet relation.

examples.title: Overlap relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to another feature using the geo:ehOverlap relation.
